gov.nasa.worldwind.util.tree

Class BasicFrameAttributes

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwind.util.tree.BasicFrameAttributes
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FrameAttributes

    public class BasicFrameAttributes
extends java.lang.Object
implements FrameAttributes
    Basic implementation of FrameAttributes set.
